In first phase study , focus growth development age 3 year . In second phase study , focus turn cardiometabolic factor age 9 year . Infertility treatment include assisted reproductive technology ( ART ) vitro fertilization ( IVF ) , control ovarian hyperstimulation ( COH ) ovulation induction ( OI ) .
